text.paragraph-1: Consolidating the library involves the following actions: deleting comic files marked for deletion.

rescan.paragraph1: Use this button to force rescanning your entire library.
rescan.paragraph2: The server will re-evaluate each of the comics in your library, updating what it knows about each file.
rescan.paragraph3: NOTE: While the library is being rescanned, you will not be able to import new comics.
rescan.already-running: A rescan is current running on the server...

backup.paragraph1: Use this section to download and restore snapshots of your library database.
backup.paragraph2: To download the current database content, click on the Export Library button.
